ChildRiderProvisions.Description: Children's Term Rider, which is available to children ages 14 days to 20 years. Benefit amounts are $5,000 to $30,000 per child. The premium for the rider does not change when additional children are added. The IAC Children's Term Rider also has a value added conversion privilege. This allows rider holding young adults between the ages of 20 to 25 to exercise their conversion option. Each insured child may convert to a new permanent policy (with no evidence of insurability) for an amount up to 10 times the Term Rider to a maximum of $150,000. In addition, one will find a 20% discount on the converted policy for the first five policy years.

SpousalRiderProvisions.Description: The minimum coverage amount is $50,000 for the spouse. The IAC spouse's rider coverage amount can be a maximum of the face amount of the based insured. If the Base Insured amount is $300,000 then the spouse rider can be up to $300,000.
